doc:
Tito Vuolo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tito_Vuolo 0 Tito Vuolo (22 March 1893 – 14 September 1962) was an Italian-born American actor, best known for his supporting work playing often stereotypical Italian characters. Prior to his film career, he had toured the United States as a stage actor. His wife was Grazia "Grace" Vuolo. Tito Vuolo was born on 22 March 1893 in Gragnano, Campania, Italy. He died from cancer in Los Angeles, California on 14 September 1962. Tito_Vuolo ( 22_March_1893 – 14_September_1962 ) was an_Italian-born_American_actor , best_known for his_supporting_work_playing_often_stereotypical_Italian_characters . Prior to his_film_career , he had_toured the_United_States as a_stage_actor . His_wife was Grazia_"_Grace_"_Vuolo . Tito_Vuolo was_born on 22_March_1893 in Gragnano , Campania , Italy . He died from cancer in Los_Angeles , California on 14_September_1962 .
